incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.
Start time : 26/04/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 27/04/2022 14:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : Water manifold replacement

Start time : 18/05/2022 19:00 UTC End time : 18/05/2022 20:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : We need to improve security protocol to access the infra. The goal is to improve our quality by getting a better notation regarding our SSL connection (Secure Sockets Layer,standard technology for keeping an internet connection secure and safeguarding any sensitive data that is being sent between two systems, preventing criminals from reading and modifying any information transferred, including potential personal details.)
Start time : 18/05/2022 20:00 UTC End time : 19/05/2022 05:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to migrate the core network from SBG3 to SBG5
Start time : 19/05/2022 00:00 UTC End time : 19/05/2022 03:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be updating our network equipment.

Start time : 19/05/2022 02:30 UTC
End time : 19/05/2022 09:30 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be updating a network equipment.

Start time : 19/05/2022 18:00 UTC End time : 19/05/2022 22:00 UTC Service impact : No impact, but some latency is expected from DC US to SGP. Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to replace a network equipment.
Start time : 19/05/2022 20:00 UTC End time : 20/05/2022 05:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to migrate the core network from SBG3 to SBG5

Start time : 23/05/2022 01:30 UTC End time : 23/05/2022 04:30 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be updating a network equipment linked to hosted private cloud.
Start time : 23/05/2022 20:00 UTC End time : 24/05/2022 05:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to migrate the core network from SBG3 to SBG5

Start time : 25/05/2022 02:30 UTC End time : 25/05/2022 09:30 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : The objective of this change is to upgrade the version of the Top of Rack (ToR) switch to maintain consistency.
Start time : 25/05/2022 06:30 UTC End time : 25/05/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to do some electrical work
Update : The maintenance has been postponed to the 25/05/2022 Start time: 25/05/2022 21:00 UTC End time: 25/05/2022 22:00 UTC

Start time :12/05/2022 21:00UTC End time :12/05/2022 22:00UTC Service impact : All projects and environments will continue to function during the upgrade; however, Console User Interface, Git, and Crons will be unavailable during the reindexing of git logs, which may take up to 6 hours for the biggest Git repositories. Projects provisioning is not impacted. Service improvement : Git needs to be upgrated
Update : Maintenance is postponed to 26/05/2022 08:00 UTC

Start time : 26/05/2022 08:00 UTC End time : 26/05/2022 12:00 UTC Service impact : Loss of power to E103A12 Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to replace a plastic water cooling clarinet by a copper one.
Start time : 30/05/2022 06:30 UTC End time : 30/05/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to do some electrical work
Start time : 31/05/2022 06:10 UTC End time : 31/05/2022 14:11 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : Adding of a circuit breaker on the normaclip of the cabinets.

Start time : 01/06/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 01/06/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : Downtime of 1 minute while switching to battery charging. Service improvement: Carry out annual/curative maintenance of the UPS
Start time : 02/06/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 02/06/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement: The objective of this is to carry out annual/curative maintenance of UPS

Start time : 06/06/2022 08:00 UTC End time : 06/06/2022 17:00 UTC Service impact : Public network will be unreachable on racks E103A17 and E103A18 Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to do some electrical work.

Start time : 06/06/2022 08:00 UTC End time : 06/06/2022 17:00 UTC Service impact : Public network will be unreachable on racks E105A01 E105A02 E105A03 E105A04 E105A08 E105B09 E105B10 E105C11 E105C12. Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to do some electrical work.
Start time : 07/06/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 07/06/2022 16:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement: Carry out annual/curative maintenance of the UPS
Start time : 07/06/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 07/06/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to check the operating condition of the generators

Start time : 14/06/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 14/06/2022 16:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement: Carry out annual/curative maintenance of the UPS
Start time : 20/06/2022 06:30 UTC End time : 20/06/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : None Following a constructor's guideline, we're doing a maintenance on a power delivery component in redundancy.
Start time : 23/08/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 23/08/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement: The objective of this maintenance is to carry out annual/curative maintenance of a UPS.
Start time : 10/11/2022 07:30 UTC End time : 10/11/2022 16:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : We will perform load tests on the generators.
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.
